title: Quality Assurance Audit Specialist – Full-Time (Remote)
job_overview:
As a QA Audit Specialist, you’ll be responsible for reviewing and verifying data entries made by agents across Slack and CRM platforms. You’ll play a key role in maintaining data integrity, streamlining processes, and helping team leads focus on performance rather than manual checking.

Key Responsibilities:
-Review client details submitted by agents in Slack and cross-reference with multiple CRM platforms
-Ensure adherence to rate cards and operational protocols for various partner companies
-Categorize audit results using a thumbs-up/thumbs-down system and provide constructive feedback
-Track and document audit results for performance improvement and accountability
-Identify recurring error patterns and collaborate with team leads for corrective actions
-Assist in centralizing the QA process to reduce part-time support dependencies
-Stay updated with software/system changes and audit requirement updates
-Support continuous process improvement initiatives

Requirements:
-Proven experience in quality assurance, data auditing, or verification roles
-High attention to detail and accuracy when working with large data sets
-Familiarity with CRM tools and audit protocols
-Ability to work independently and manage tasks with minimal supervision
-Strong organizational and analytical thinking skills
-Willing to undergo in-depth training across seven different platforms
-Flexibility to work in a rotating shift within a 14-hour window

Preferred Qualifications:
-Experience in customer support or operations in a fast-paced environment
-Familiarity with Slack, Front (ticketing system), and AI-driven automation tools
-Background in process improvement and data-based decision-making

Apply now if you’re ready to play a critical role in ensuring accuracy and efficiency for growing remote teams!
